template<class Base>
virtual void iview::TShapeBase< Base >::CalcBoundingBox ( i2d::CRect &  result) const [protected, pure virtual]

Calculate bounding box.

You have to implement this method in your shapes implementations.

Implemented in iview::CInteractiveTransformableRectangleShape, iview::CTransformableRectangleCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveParallelogramShape, iview::CInteractiveShapeBase, iview::CInteractivePolygonShape, iview::CPolygonCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveLabelShape, iview::CInteractiveArrowShape, iview::CInteractiveAnnulusShape, iview::CInteractiveRectangleShape, iview::CNoneCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveCircleShape, iview::CPinCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractivePinShape, iview::CInteractiveAnnulusSegmentShape, iview::CImageShape, iview::CInteractiveCenterPinShape, iview::CInteractivePerspectiveCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveSplineShape, and iview::CPolypointShape.

template<class Base >
void iview::TShapeBase< Base >::InvalidateBoundingBox ( ) [inline, protected, virtual]

Invalidate bounding box.

You can overload this method to provide validation of your internal attributes, because this method is called from Invalidate(int) and OnDisplayChange(int) methods. Please don't forget base method call in your implementations.

Reimplemented in iview::CInteractiveParallelogramShape, iview::CInteractiveTransformableRectangleShape, iview::CTransformableRectangleCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveArrowShape, and iview::CInteractiveRectangleShape.
